name: Omega
description: The Omega is the Pharmakon Analogue of the Altairian Zeus, designed for swift and deadly strikes, fulfilling a niche role in addition to the Inhibitor Battlecruiser.
tips-builds:
The Omega's main advantages come in the form of improved DoT Bonuses as compared to other Pharmakon Hulls, as well as its Omega Beam, which fires a powerful beam of Plasma that pierces through everything in its path.
It also has decent speed stats, on par with a typical Cruiser. With Double forward Firing arcs, it can deal as much damage as a Battlecruiser or Battleship.
author: 137B201F8F7AD871
